sentences.en: I didn't know there was Army land hereabouts.
sentences.cn: 我一点也不知道这附近有军队驻扎.

sentences.en: I think I saw a police officer somewhere hereabouts.
sentences.cn: 我想我在附近的什么地方看见过一名警官.

sentences.en: It's a bit chilly and empty hereabouts.
The mountains hereabouts reach heights of over 2000 metres.
sentences.cn: 这一带的山高达两千多米。

sentences.en: There is no better place for your flock to gaze in than hereabouts.
sentences.cn: 你在这附近放牧是再合适不过的了.

sentences.en: There must be a pub hereabouts.

trans.tran_en: somewhere near the place where you are
